name: Race Against Thyme
description:
Protect your mountain Thyme from sheep and decay in this 'Thyme-Management' game.  How long can you keep your beautiful herbs safe?

Inspired by life and how stressors just keep coming and coming, with no reprieve in sight, and you never have enough time to do everything no matter how frantically you try to fix things. Also made for GamesPlusJames' game jam.

This game was made on a time crunch (game jam), so its pretty shoddy. I may come back and make it look/play/sound nicer.

Here's where I got the sheep picture: https://www.google.com/search?q=sheep&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwj_1cXqwK3ZAhUiSN8KHXjMDQEQ_AUICigB&biw=1280&bih=619#imgdii=ZCLBVTrS77txHM:&imgrc=EzT_LeAKOrc3pM:

Here's where I got the Thyme picture: https://www.google.com/search?q=thyme&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiQ5Zr7563ZAhXHnOAKHf1-BrQQ_AUICigB&biw=1280&bih=619#imgrc=ajSic_vggWezwM:

Music by me (don't worry its not my best song, I can do better with more time... I think)
